label: Description
value: Off-white silk brocaded in multicolored silks in a fan-shaped pattern of detached elements in a horizontal arrangement. Threes rows in a staggered repeat have a tree and flower motif that alternates with paired mermen blowing horns. The next row has men in chariots. Below are addorsed leaping dogs that aternate with a floral spray. Row below has a square-rigged vessel.
